Seam Security ${project.version}
=========================

Seam Security provides a number of features for securing your Java EE6 application.


Contents of distribution
========================

 artifacts/
 
   Seam Security libraries

 doc/

   API Docs and reference guide.
  
 examples/

   Seam Security Examples
  
 lib/

   Library dependencies for this module
   
 source/
 
   Source code for this module
  
Licensing
=========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 Software License, Version 2.0 (ASL).

Seam Security URLs
==================

Seam Framework Home Page:      http://www.seamframework.org
Downloads:                     http://www.seamframework.org/Download/SeamDownloads
Forums:                        http://www.seamframework.org/Community/SeamUsers
Source Code:                   git://github.com/seam/security.git
Issue Tracking:                http://jira.jboss.org/jira/browse/SEAMSECURITY

Release Notes
=============

Version 3.0.0.Beta1
-------------------
New Authentication API 

Version 3.0.0 Alpha 1
---------------------
First alpha release of Seam Security 3.x, ported from Seam 2.x to CDI. This release does not include external authentication features.
